meanings.definition: The act of decorating metal objects with a black compound.
meanings.sent1: Nielloing adds a dark touch to metal objects.
meanings.sent2: Artisans use nielloing to enhance the beauty of metal items.
meanings.sent3: The black magic of nielloing transforms plain metal into art.
meanings.sent4: Nielloing is like painting with shadows on metal surfaces.
meanings.sent5: The art of nielloing brings depth and contrast to metalwork.

meanings.definition: The process of creating designs on metal using niello.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carefully practice nielloing to craft intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: Nielloing involves skillfully etching designs onto metal surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The art of nielloing turns metal into a canvas for creativity.
meanings.sent4: Nielloing is like sculpting with shadows on metal canvases.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nielloing lies in its ability to create detailed motifs on metal.

meanings.definition: The technique of applying niello to metal surfaces for decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: Nielloing requires precision in adding decorative elements to metal.
meanings.sent2: Artists use nielloing to embellish metal surfaces with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The art of nielloing turns metal into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Nielloing is like adding a touch of elegance to metal with dark accents.
meanings.sent5: The technique of nielloing enhances the aesthetic appeal of metal objects.
